comments.body: `args` might contain something we want to avoid, this should be `if (base.typeParams.length == args.length) apply(base.appliedTo(args)) else base`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +98,102 @@          val base = apply(tycon)
          val args = tp.baseArgInfos(base.typeSymbol)
          if (base.typeParams.length == args.length) base.appliedTo(args) else base
        case tp @ RefinedType(parent, name) if variance > 0 =>
          val parent1 = apply(tp.parent)

comments.body: Was this change motivated by some test that didn't pass?
Yes, it was when compiling the dotty compiler itself.
This looks fine but is unrelated to the current pull request and ideally should be split in another commit.
Agreed, but I don't have time to do that. Way too many other things on my plate :-(
